alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Oakland County through 445 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holly, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clarkston around 420 PM EDT. Ortonville around 425 PM EDT. Oxford around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Rochester Hills, Waterford, Davisburg, White Lake, Holly State Recreation Area, Rose Center, Lake Orion, Auburn Hills and Lake Angelus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
